response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and potential impact on your business, I am confident it could be a game-changer for you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic alignment between our values and aims, providing you with a chance to secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a fruitful partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
